Welcome to Vayesta’s documentation!

Vayesta is a set of tools and Python modules for setting up….

Vayesta is designed to perform efficient TO COMPLETE. Vayesta aims to be easy to use. Actual implemented methods are:

The code is freely available under the GNU General Public License…

Vayesta must load ground state properties from previous CCSD/MP2 calculations. This achieved by using PySCF as a calculator code.

See the Installation page for more detailed instructions for installing Vayesta. The Quickstart page has been designed to get easily started using Vayesta once the package is installed.
